newsitem.title: INDIA: Ford Indian unit prices Escort model cars.
newsitem.headline: Ford Indian unit prices Escort model cars.

text.p: U.S. car maker Ford Motor Co's Indian venture Mahindra Ford said on Friday it priced its Escort cars in the range of 544,569 rupees to 662,609.
The company said its petrol-fuelled 1.3 litre standard car would cost 544,469 rupees while its LX model is priced at 575,288.
The 1.8 litre diesel standard car is priced at 631,790 rupees and its LX model 662,609, the company said in a statement.
The firm said bookings for the cars will be open for 15 days from September 9 on deposit of 35,000 rupees.
Mahindra Ford is equally owned by India's Mahindra & Mahindra and Ford Motor Company of the United States.
